data.message: I listened to you for years. Ever since I was little. But you said "fuck you" because I don't agree with your politics. It's a shame you're willing to throw your fans under the bus just so you can stand on a soap box. I won't deny your talent. However I question your character and if you really care about all your fans or just the ones who agree with you. I'm disappointed.

replies.message: He doesn't care at all. He sees what going on. Open your eyes!!!!! If you're a loyal fan, you would understand.
It's about respect. I respect him. I would like to be respected in turn as a fan. He's entitled to his opinion, but tell me to fuck off because i don't agree with you.

Brody Nolan It's called making a stand... If you support Trump then the ''Fuck You'' was for you. For everyone else Eminem thank us for years of support. Trump is a con man and only morons get conned.
